author: OneMightyArc
name: NameChecker
short: Alerts on non-standard usernames/nicknames on join.
description: Notifies a configured channel when a new member joins with a username or nickname containing characters not typically found on a standard English American keyboard. Helps enforce server naming rules.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores guild-specific channel IDs for alert notifications. It checks usernames and nicknames against a predefined set of allowed characters but does not store the names themselves beyond what is included in a temporary alert message.
